newsitem.title: USA: PeopleSoft shares drop amid broad sell-off.
newsitem.headline: PeopleSoft shares drop amid broad sell-off.

text.p: PeopleSoft Inc stock tumbled as much as six points on Monday, pulled down by a broad sell-off in the technology sector and specific concerns that the company share price no longer could command a mutiple to earnings of more than 100 times.

Traders and analysts said PeopleSoft's decline came in the absence of any fresh news from the company since it reported slightly better-than-expected fourth-quarter results last Tuesday. The company was not immediately available to comment.

The earnings report was followed by a wave of upgrades by analysts, including Goldman Sachs' Rick Sherlunds, who placed the stock on the firm's recommended list. He previously rated the stock as market outperform.
